message.name: INF_WATSON_ASSISTANT_DISABLED
message.locale: The Watson Assistant feature is disabled. For more information about how to enable Watson Assistant, see the product documentation.

message.name: ERR_WATSON_ASSISTANT_JWT_KEYSTORE_PROPS_MISSING
message.locale: An error occurred with creating the JWT token. Ensure that the JWT Keystore system properties are configured correctly and try again. For more information about system properties, see the product documentation.
